sense.def:
Known
je pretekli deležnik glagola
to know
.

Kadar je nekaj
known to people
, se ljudje tistega zavedajo in imajo podatke o tistem.

seg.quote: There's no known cure for a cold.
...the most dangerous substance known to man.

sense.def:
To let it be known that something is the case
pomeni poskrbeti, da ljudje izvedo za nekaj, ne da bi jim neposredno povedali;

seg.quote: She let it be known that she wanted to leave China.
